title: Interdisciplinary Collaborative Project Based on Design Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational design thinking concepts and job-related expertise
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, focused on workplace problem-solving

learning_goals: Can solve real-world work problems using the design thinking process in collaboration with team members from diverse fields
Can develop prototypes of creative solutions integrating interdisciplinary perspectives
Strengthen collaborative competencies to improve solutions through iterative feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
